TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WritingCompletedEventHandler(object sender, WritingCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WritingCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents a method that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> class.
